summary: A new destruction perk to give a reason to robes.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]

I have just added a perk called "Robe expert" that gives you +25% destruction damage if you wearing a robe.
With this mod you have a valid reason to wear robes instead of an armor cuirass.

Mod it's cleaned with tes5edit.

An italian version is available in the zipped package.


[color=yellow][b]Know issue:[/b][/color]

Actually you can have the +25% bonus even if you are wearing anything on torso. I know it's a bit annoying but in this way i have done the mod with just 2 simple entry changes, so compatibility it's maximized.
If you have any idead how to avoid this, please leave a comment.
